    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab/AD/Instrumentation, 2012

        public int getCode()

        The user-defined "code"

      • setCode

        public void setCode(int n)
        Gives the channel an attribute that can be interpreted in a number of ways. Initially, this code is either 0 or 1; 0 means show the URL in the normal way; 1 means show the URL in a wrapper web page, which (presumably) has color and Display number information on it, somehow.
        Parameters:
        n - The new user-defined code
